scripts.start: aux() { yarn workspace:log "$(cd lessons && ls -d *"$1"* | head -1)" start; }; aux
scripts.build: aux() { yarn workspace:log "$(cd lessons && ls -d *"$1"* | head -1)" build; }; aux
scripts.test: aux() { yarn workspace:log "$(cd lessons && ls -d *"$1"* | head -1)" test; }; aux
scripts.workspace:log: aux() { echo "Running $2 in $1." && yarn workspace "$@"; }; aux
